channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 08:45 Air anxiety in the Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 08:45 Air anxiety in the Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.#Sumy_oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 06:52 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further messages.

item.title: 游리 05:48 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Highorivska Territorial Community
